name: Enter the Hivemind (Beta)
description:
Controls:

Ship Controls:

W: Move Forward

A: Strafe Left

S: Strafe Right

D: Move Backwards

Left: Turn Left

Right: Turn Right

Up: Increase Handling

Down: Decrease Handling

Space: Shoot

Jason Controls:

W: Walk North

A: Walk West

S: Walk South

D: Walk East

Up: Sneak North

Left: Sneak West

Down: Sneak South

Right: Sneak East

W + Up: Speed-walk North

A + Left: Speed-walk West

S + Down: Speed-walk South

D + Right: Speed-walk East

Enter: Use Stairs or Progress Through Dialogue
